UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Novel Hybrid Peptide Cathelicidin 2 (1-13)-Thymopentin (TP5) and Its Derived Peptides with Effective Antibacterial, Antibiofilm, and Anti-Adhesion Activities.
Literature.Author: Guo H-N, Tong Y-C, Wang H-L, Zhang J, Li Z-X, Abbas Z, Yang T-T, Liu M-Y, Chen P-Y, Hua Z-C, et al.

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Intestinal Porcine Epithelial Cells IPEC-J2:20% Inhibition=>512 µg/ml
